title: Artchyls — A new Platform and Mobile app to Bring Art to the Next Level
text:
LAUSANNE, Switzerland — October 9, 2015 — Artchyls has the intention to develop art by creating a platform and a mobile app in order to provide a social and interactive dimension to the art which, at the moment, has a very selective atmosphere.
This platform will allow young artists emerging in the field to have an information base and strong contacts to get started in their respective fields. They’ll be able to present and promote their work, sell or auction their artworks, participate to international contest in order to collaborate with brands or companies and offer a chance for students to get a prestigious scholarship to guarantee their success in school.
Artchyls allows art lovers to meet artists, search information, discover museums or galleries in cities they visit and localize artworks around them. From a simple graffiti to a monumental sculpture, they’ll be able to recognize any artist by taking a picture with their smartphone.
We don’t forget anyone and that’s why Artchyls thought about diversified features also for museums and galleries offering them a place for their introduction, an online ticketing system, a custom local promotion, a GPS system to guide visitors up to their museum/gallery and much more!
We also invite collectors and journalists specialized in the domain of art to join the community and use unique professional tools, get a free access to all exhibitions in collaboration with Artchyls and download prewritten press releases of artists.
However, before everyone can enjoy this platform, Artchyls needs help. That’s why we launched this . The goal of this project is to raise $ 100,000 by November 15, 2015. The funds raised will go towards developing and completing the software.
To help bring this innovative platform to market, please visit the or click here . Perks will be delivered between November 2015 and December 2016. Artchyls is lucky to collaborate with more than forty well known artists such as Alexandre Deschaumes, Balazs Solti, David Olkarny, GoddoG, Habbenink, Hopnn, Marchal Mithouard (Shaka), Polina Washington, Robert Farkas, SAMINA and many others who are preparing lots of limited artworks as gifts to offer you.
Any amount given can make a difference, and this is an incredible opportunity to be a part of a special campaign! Help Artchyls reach the goal by sharing this on Facebook , Twitter, and other social networks. The more people know about this, the more support the campaign will receive.
